medium: Linen; Punto Ricamato a Maglia Quadra (embroidered net)
title: Band
description: A border of white flaxen thread embroidered with same. Men and women holding hands dancing. Man also appears to hold the horse\'s head while another man is on his back and appears to carry a banner. The women\'s skirts are variously decorated with ornato in ground with small ornato in outer borders, birds and dogs of various sizes. Design complete.
